name: Love Island: Cats vs Monsters
description:
Description:

This is a game where you can play with cats spreading love around their path.

The islands you play on are being invaded by toxic monsters that contaminates their path.

You must avoid the toxic trails, while trying to make the monsters go through your own love path, which will hurt them.

---

Controls:

Arrow keys or W A S D for movement. In co-op, one player uses arrows and the other wasd.

Space or Enter to start the game.

---

Game Jam:

This game was made for the https://itch.io/jam/major-jam-2 competition. With the theme love and a restriction of having all the game graphics fit in a single 128x128 image (except primitives like lines, circles, letters, etc...). It was done with pure javascript, no frameworks, tools, makers or engines used.

As required in the competition, here is the image which sources the whole game:

Sounds used from these sources:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/copycat
  • https://opengameart.org/content/85-short-music-jingles
  • https://opengameart.org/content/interface-sounds
